actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Requiring each Member of the House of Representatives to hold at least 12 town meetings per year in the district of the Member.

summary.text: Requires each Member of the House of Representatives to hold at least 12 town meetings each calendar year in his or her district. Reduces by two-thirds the amount made available to the Member from the Official Mail Allowance for the next calendar year if the Member does not comply with this Act.

titles.title: Requiring each Member of the House of Representatives to hold at least 12 town meetings per year in the district of the Member.
